I developed an upgrade for my machines, making use of a principle similar to the item pusher and programming it into a specialized chipset.
This system ensures that the machine expels its products or materials that are no longer needed to a side that I designate as the output (using a logistics editor in item mode).
高品質（chip power）的運輸晶片組與普通晶片相比沒有任何更多的優勢!
Info: The actual effect of this chipset will be determined by the machine in which this chipset is installed.
Hint: Refer to "Logic Chipset" for general information on chipsets.
